item.title: Iâ€™m Back
item.description: For years I used to run both a tech blog and a blog in my native language. At some point I realized I haven’t posted in years, backed it up and shut everything down. Since then a few things happened: I got into 3D printing, have a sometime interesting $dayjob, gave up on Facebook (never been much active on twitter). All those are going towards me wanting to share stuff (I’m sure all 3 of you reading this will be happy) and having no place to do it.
